objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has used vssadmin to create a volume shadow copy and retrieve the NTDS.dit file. [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has also used reg save on the SYSTEM file Registry location to help extract the NTDS.dit file.(Citation: Secureworks BRONZE PRESIDENT December 2019)

external_references.description: Counter Threat Unit Research Team. (2019, December 29). BRONZE PRESIDENT Targets NGOs. Retrieved April 13, 2021.
